YOUR ELECTRONICS RESOURCE
Oops, something went wrong

Mostly an error occurs in the following cases:

  • A wrong file was chosen (too big or too small)
  • ART data partition had wrong size, it must be 64KiB

You can read more information of the error in the bootloader console. If you need assistance please contact info@dptechnics.com.

Install firmware Update bootloader Update ART data
